txt.en: 'While I deem the turtles of this marsh would provide adequate provisions and supplies for my party, I recognize that they can also be a threat. They are very aggressive, and we have nothing with which to defend ourselves against them.\n\n'Would you, therefore, go forth and cull their numbers somewhat? I do not want them purged from the marsh, but simply have their threat lessened.'
'Thank you, [placeholder]...I was becoming afraid that we might have to move our camp....'
Frogildi recognizes the danger posed by the great turtles of the Rushgore and has a plan to control them.
Turtles can be found throughout the Rushgore.\n\nFrogildi has asked you to cull the numbers of the turtles in the Rushgore.
Talk to Frogildi at the Woodman camp in the Rushgore
Frogildi is at the Woodman camp at the heart of the Rushgore.\n\nYou should return to Frogildi with news of your success.
